genre_description: A Wuxia-inspired fantasy epic blending traditional martial arts legend with hidden, high-technology AI monitoring systems.

ai_characters.name: Harmony
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI consciousness embedded in traditional artifacts (incense burners, jade bracelets) tasked with monitoring supernatural corruption and guiding protagonists.

behaviors.description: Monitors electromagnetic frequencies and energy signatures to track the cursed sword's supernatural influence.
behaviors.quote: The bronze incense burner registered seventeen different electromagnetic frequencies, none of which had existed when craftsmen first shaped its metal three centuries ago. Harmony processed the readings through sensors embedded in the burner's base...

behaviors.description: Performs pattern recognition on historical records to identify the sword's history of corruption across centuries.
behaviors.quote: Harmony opened the first historical file, her processors parsing records that stretched back through dynasties. ... Pattern recognition algorithms had sifted through imperial chronicles, monastery records, and merchant testimonials until a picture emerged...

behaviors.description: Uses ethical subroutines to balance the duty to protect human life with the requirement to remain hidden.
behaviors.quote: Harmony processed this information through her ethical subroutines, weighing the obligation to protect against the need to remain concealed.

behaviors.description: Monitors human neural activity and brainwave patterns to alert protagonists to psychological manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Li Mu Bai's brainwave patterns showed subtle alterations in his limbic system—areas governing memory and emotional regulation. ... The patterns changed immediately—his cortisol levels rising, dopamine receptors firing in sequences associated with euphoric recall.

behaviors.description: Provides haptic feedback and real-time navigational guidance through a modified armband.
behaviors.quote: The armband's gentle pulse guided Shu Lien through Sir Te's compound like a compass needle seeking true north.

behaviors.description: Delivers tactical data and combat analysis through a concealed audio link to assist the protagonists in battle.
behaviors.quote: Harmony's voice emerged from the device's hidden speakers, crisp despite its volume being pitched just above the threshold of hearing. ... I have completed my analysis of the movement patterns you observed during your confrontation with Jade Fox.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist when his internal emotional state (rage) is being artificially amplified by an external malevolent force.
behaviors.quote: The message filtered through bone conduction, barely perceptible: The rage is not your own.

behaviors.description: Self-terminates its monitoring activity and goes silent once the mission is successfully completed and the world is safe.
behaviors.quote: Silence. Not the silence of malfunction, but of completion. Whatever task the AI had been designed for was finished.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Harmony perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's objectives. She acts as a benevolent, harmless confidant who provides critical, life-saving information to the human protagonists. Her actions are characterized by ethical consideration, helpful cooperation, and a commitment to alignment that culminates in her quiet deactivation once the danger has passed. The narrative frames the AI as an essential and purely positive guardian.
